name: Regular Strategy Game
description:
Regular Strategy Game is strategy puzzle game built around the idea of combining aspects from a board game with turn based combat.
Battle your way against the enemy pieces through smart usage of your pieces' skills and tactical positioning.

What's in the box?

  • 5 Different pieces, each with unique movesets
  • 7 Kinds of enemies, with diverse moving and attacking patterns
  • 50 levels with varying difficulty

Will you be able to figure out the right moves to beat each challenge?
